sentences.en: Acoustic phonetics - the study of the physical properties of speech sounds.
Articulatory phonetics is the study of the production of speech sounds.
sentences.cn: 发音语音学研究语音的产生.

sentences.en: Daniel Jones is generally as the foremost authority on phonetics.
sentences.cn: 丹尼尔琼斯通常被认为是语音学方面的最高权威.

sentences.en: Daniel Jones is generally referred to as the foremost authority on phonetics.
sentences.cn: 丹尼尔·琼斯通常被认为是语音学方面的最高权威.

sentences.en: Forensics includes many fields of science, including anthropology, biology, chemistry, engineering, genetics, medicine, pathology, phonetics, psychiatry, and toxicology.
sentences.cn: 法医物证学涉及到多个科学领域，包括人类学、工程学、医药学、病理学、语音学、精神病学和毒理学。

sentences.en: He was popularly regarded as a great authority on phonetics.
sentences.cn: 他被普遍认为是语音学方面的大权威.

sentences.en: I borrowed from the library a primer of phonetics.
sentences.cn: 我从图书馆借了一本语音学入门书.
语音学是研究语言声音的.

sentences.en: Phonetics has to do with the production of speech sounds.
sentences.cn: 其中音位学与语音的功能有关而语音学与语音的产生有关.

sentences.en: Phonetics is the science of sounds.
sentences.cn: 语音学是一门语音的科学.

sentences.en: Starting from Chinese phonetics, follow in order and advance step by step.
sentences.cn: 课程从基础语音开始, 循序渐进的讲授日常生活中的各种场景.

sentences.en: Taking such refresher courses in Linguistics as phonetics, phonology, morphology, and etymology in Dept. of Japanese at Shanghai University of Foreign Languages (9/1992-7/1993).
sentences.cn: 在上海外国语大学日语系进修语音学，音位学，形态学和词源学等语言学课程（1992年9月至1993年7月）。

sentences.en: The results were published in the Journal of Phonetics quarterly magazine.
sentences.cn: 这项研究结果在《语音》季刊上发表.

sentences.en: The study of Intonation is one of the important problems in phonetics.
sentences.cn: 语调研究是当前语音学和音系学研究的重要课题之一.

sentences.en: There are also advanced music classrooms multimedia classrooms, phonetics classrooms.
sentences.cn: 并有高质量的音乐教室, 语音教室和电教室.

sentences.en: Useful Courses for English - teaching include: Psychology, teaching methodology, phonetics, rhetoric, grammar, composition.
sentences.cn: 对英语教学有用的课程包括: 心理学 、 教学方法论 、 语音学 、 修辞学 、 语法 、 写作.
